main: ^After defeating the Keeper, John found his daughter in the same abyss where the battle had taken place. Fortunately, she was unharmed.
^Whatever the Keeper's intentions, our hero thwarted them. The balance has been upset and John is an outcast on all worlds.
^He and his daughter must live constantly running from the inhabitants of the wild worlds, but now that they are together, they will overcome all difficulties...
